mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SERVICE_TERM_EFFECTIVE_DATE DESC) AS rnum, SERVICE_TERM_ID, SERVICE_TERM_SUBJECT, SERVICE_TERM_NAME, SERVICE_TERM_CONTENT, SERVICE_TERM_EFFECTIVE_DATE FROM service_term ) AS ranked_terms WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO service_term (service_term_id, created_at, service_term_subject, service_term_name, service_term_content, service_term_expiration_date, service_term_effective_date, service_term_status) VALUES (#{serviceTermId}, NOW(), #{serviceTermSubject}, #{serviceTermName}, #{serviceTermContent}, #{serviceTermExpirationDate}, #{serviceTermEffectiveDate}, #{serviceTermStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM service_term ORDER BY service_term_effective_date DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY service_term_effective_date DESC) AS rnum, service_term_id, service_term_subject, service_term_name, service_term_content, service_term_expiration_date, service_term_effective_date FROM service_term ) AS subquery WHERE rnum = #{rnum}
SELECT MAX(rnum) FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY service_term_effective_date DESC) AS rnum FROM service_term ) AS subquery
